meanings.definition: Wearing glasses with lenses for correcting defective vision.
meanings.sent1: The foureyed student wore glasses to see better in class.
meanings.sent2: She felt more confident with her foureyed look, knowing she could see clearly.
meanings.sent3: The foureyed cat tried on tiny glasses but couldn't see any mice.
meanings.sent4: His foureyed appearance gave him a wise and scholarly air.
meanings.sent5: The foureyed owl perched on a branch, its glasses glinting in the moonlight.

meanings.definition: Having four eyes or eye-like markings.
meanings.sent1: The butterfly had beautiful foureyed patterns on its wings.
meanings.sent2: The foureyed fish seemed to be watching from all angles in the tank.
meanings.sent3: The foureyed flower petals looked like tiny eyes peeking out.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was filled with stars, creating a foureyed wonder above.
meanings.sent5: The foureyed peacock feathers shimmered in the sunlight, mesmerizing all who saw.
